allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: map existing codebase

- STACK.md - Technologies and dependencies
- ARCHITECTURE.md - System design and patterns
- STRUCTURE.md - Directory layout
- CONVENTIONS.md - Code style and patterns
- TESTING.md - Test structure
- INTEGRATIONS.md - External services
- CONCERNS.md - Technical debt and issues

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: initialize fault.watch UI Redesign & TikTok Content Engine

Transform dashboard into news/media-style crisis monitor with TikTok content generation.

Creates PROJECT.md with requirements and constraints.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: create roadmap \(4 phases\)

UI Redesign & TikTok Content Engine

Phases:
1. ui-foundation: Restructure layout, typography, visual hierarchy
2. breaking-news-components: Dramatic alerts, headlines, animations
3. content-export-engine: Screenshot/image export for TikTok
4. auto-clip-generator: Video generation from market events

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Citigroup short, Lloyd''s deadline, JPM flip, update Fed repo

Critical dashboard updates:
- Fed repo: $23B → $51B \(Dec 26-28 repos\)
- Citigroup: 6.34B oz short \(LARGER than MS 5.9B\)
- Lloyd''s deadline: Jan 31, 2026 \(Citi loses insurance\)
- JPMorgan: Flipped from 200M short → 750M LONG
- Dual countdown timers \(Lloyd''s Jan 31 + SEC Feb 15\)
- Bank short positions table \(Citi, MS, JPM\)
- Combined exposure: 12.24B oz shorts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
